nodes.text: A male Human member of the Scions of Zakuul served the Eternal Empire with Exarch Malforia, and had a vision about her climbing a sky-ladder with a metal assassin before facing her greatest test. Right after he said it, he was killed by Malforia under order by Emperor Arcann. Years later, his prophecy would come true on Obus VI, where Malforia's test turned out to be the vacuum of space, which she did not survive.
Unidentified Scion is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire Interlude: Shroud of Memory.
